slides.contentText:
Welcome to my Fiori portfolio!

Feel free to take a look at some of my spare-time projects/investigations :)

Header icon plugins

In this Launchpad you can also see that there are extra header icons, included through Fiori Launchpad plugins! Feel free to try 'em out :)

Season mode plugin

In addition, there is also the inclusion of a Season Mode plugin, in charge of adapting the theme according to the current time of the year :)

A bunch of other stuff behind-the-scenes here and many things to show up here in the future...

depending on my free time / masochism / curiosity / (eternal) willing to explore new things! :)
